song.title: Love Bliss
song.info:
This song is one of 6 house songs which i've made for a Wii Fitness game.
For those who miss a melody or vocals, the songs had to be drifty/impulsive but without vocals or anything disrupting the vibe.
It's a Step game for people liking to step. vocals and all are being added by the game developers themself. the stuff like "and up and down and up and down .. now left, now left.." blabla ;)
